data: ECHO-GL Liu et al. (2024a)
Heterogeneous Graph Learning from Earnings Call Data
Dual-mechanism approach combining spatial relationships and stock dynamics
MGDPR You et al. (2024)
Modeling dynamic relationship through information entropy
Multi-relational diffusion process with parallel retention
Consistently superior performance across NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai (2016-2023)
LARA Zeng et al. (2024)
Two-stage denoising framework with locality-aware attention mechanism
Enhanced iterative classification for noise reduction
Precision: 59.1% Improved win-loss ratio in volatile markets
MANA-Net Wang and Ma (2024)
Dynamic attention mechanism for market news
Enhanced trainable sentiment aggregation for prediction
SH-Mix Jain et al. (2024)
Multi-modal hierarchical reinforcement strategy
Modality-specific and extension-based mixing techniques
Performance improvement: 3-7% across tasks
SEP Koa et al. (2024a)
Self-reflective LLM framework for autonomous learning
Three-stage pipeline with PPO enhancement
Superior performance in both prediction and explanation quality
